page.title: 15Halesworth Armed Forces
page.content: This is evidence of the presence of a rmed forces in the Halesworth Section between 9 7 85 and 12 7 85.USAF 18 a-10s,6 Hercules,1 phantom.RAF 4 Tornados and 1 Canberra.There are USAF personnel at Corner House,Rectory ST.,57 Chediston ST.,Oak Green, Bedingfield Crescent,Barons Close and 28 Norwich RD.There are also British Army Cadets who have their own hut and Landrover at Market Place,Halesworth. The school is an identification point for both American and British Airforces.It is so because the Middle School is on the highest ground around Halesworth and consequently we see many low flying aircraft.And at the moment we have two sons of an American Officer at this school.
